description: A React component implementing a payment form for a bookstore frontend. It handles user input for payment details, validation, and order summary, and manages UI transitions for empty cart, processing, and success states.

methods.name: formatCardNumber
methods.description: Formats the card number input to include spaces every four digits.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission; validates input, simulates processing delay, and marks payment as successful.
